roleset.name: corrupt or taint
roleset.note: SULLY-V NOTES: Frame created by Jena (from sully.01-v)

example.text: Fuel oil pouring from the torn hull of the MV Amorogos has sullied the beautiful blue waters off the southern tip of Taiwan
example.arg: Fuel oil pouring from the torn hull of the MV Amorogos
the beautiful blue waters off the southern tip of Taiwan
